website_summaries.verdict: A great number of purchasers praised the Puma Tazon 6 FM for its excellent comfort and fit. They also found it to be a very reliable training companion for all sorts of activities. Most wearers described the shoe as supportive, lightweight, and durable. Even though there were complaints about some features, the overwhelming majority of reviewers considered it to be a great value for money.
pros: Numerous reviewers found the new Puma Tazon 6 FM to be an exceptionally comfortable training shoe
A majority of users agreed that the trainer was suitable for both indoor and outdoor exercising
Many testers applauded the perfect out-of-the-box fit of the shoe
The trainer’s excellent support was lauded by those wearers whose job involved spending a lot of time on their feet (movers and medical staff in particular)
Weightlifting aficionados thought that the shoe provided a sturdy platform for squats and deadlifts
Quite a lot of reviewers were pleasantly surprised by the quality and durability of the shoe’s components
Many purchasers found the product to be an excellent value for the money
some of them mentioned that it felt and looked more expensive than it actually cost
The streamlined style and the abundance of color schemes were very appealing to a great number of people
they found it to be appropriate for both gym and casual wear
Most testers reported that it ran true to size
cons: Several reviewers observed that the inside of the shoe got too hot during the workout, and the ventilation was insufficient
A few users commented that the cushioning was too stiff for running
A purchaser complained that the insole had worn out after a month and a half of use
The shoe required a break-in period of one training session, noted a wearer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional training shoes for gym, cycling and leisure.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional training shoes for gym, cycling and leisure. I bought my son a pair of these trainers on Black Friday at steal of a price of £25. His are the white ones. I knew I wouldn't be able to keep white trainers clean so I bought black ones which weren't reduced as much but still well priced. The fit is really comfortable and the tread is brilliant even in wet running conditions. They always look smart and the black ones only need cleaning now and then. The white ones need a little more attention.
customer_reviews.author: Dr P Sanehi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daily trainer
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Puma trainers for the last 10 years for good reason; the fit better than other brands, they're comfortable especially when worn for long times, and they're great value for money. These have the soft gel soles, which are perfect if you suffer with achy feet and do a lot of waling on hard, uneven ground. They absorb the impact brilliantly, the sole provides good grip, even on smooth surfaces and the top provides a good amount of water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Khushaal Sharma

customer_reviews.title: They stand out with the look of Class and a Look of quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puma brand trainers plus they are my colours and I love your music and videos so much more than the day before #TheDenggus 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇬🇧 Hip Hop 🎧🎵🎶🎵🎶 🇬🇧🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 Aka The Denggus 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇬🇧 AKA Herbo 🌟🌟⭐⭐⭐ I recommend you to purchase these stylish Puma trainers they are so so trendy that they are Great and the price is fantastic and they fit perfectly Hip Hop #NE33 Aka The Denggus AKA Herbo #555 #TheDenggus #1
customer_reviews.author: HiP HOP

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Horrible write a nasty review, but this is a pair of nasty cheap looking sports shoes. I sent them back and got a full refund so I have no real complaints about shipping or service other than having to have 2 attempts to return it as the courier didn’t pick up as promised, I ended up taking it it to the PO to send it myself. But they are horrible shoes avoid them and their nastiness.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Not the widest shoe go up not down on size. V.Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I heard the fit was a little narrow. I'm around a 10.5 UK so went 11. Length is fine but a little snug on my wide feet. That said I've worn them all day around the house and a trip or two out and they are really comfy and starting to shape to my foot. The Black/silver I think looks good. For the price they seem a very good gym, light run, winter day wear trainer. Great inner sole and I think the base is a really nice platform to push on from. I'd recommend. But if your feet are wide go up half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Terry

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, they look good and are comfortable. I was a little hesitant to buy at first as I only normally buy leather upper trainers but these have proved ok and are quite breathable and not sweaty, which I feared that may be. I've already ordered two more similar pairs in different colours/designs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Lovely style but not much space
customer_reviews.text: Love the style but they're so narrow, if I didnt scuff them at work I'd be returning them. Honestly 0 space for my feet. I never wore 11 in my life so getting an 11 would be way too big as well .
customer_reviews.author: ryan geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable plus good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these running trainers in November 2019. They feel very comfortable and I wore them every day, they are used for general use and I do quite a lot of walking each week. It's now 10 months since they arrived and the soles have very little signs of wear. I'm very happy with them and am going to buy another pair the same, which have come down in price and now under forty quid.
customer_reviews.author: John Stuart Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good trainer, size 10 perfect fit. Really make my feet sweat compared to other. Wierd lump in both around ball of foot but seems to have settled. Not squeeky air yet.
customer_reviews.author: Omg I buy so much stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Stable, firm and supportive trainer
customer_reviews.text: A very stable, firm and supportive trainer for exercise. I found the fit ever so slightly on the narrow side at first (I have pretty wide feet), but with some wear they do give and they're quite comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: R. WEST-SOLEY

customer_reviews.title: Jaguar!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. I wear a size 9 and these are a perfect fit; they feel small at first but, like all Puma trainers, they stretch a little when you wear them and adapt to your feet. I was particularly impressed by the way they look - better than the pictures suggest. The best thing for me is the trademark spring in my step (like a puma) created by the ankle support, which is wonderful for my bad foot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great looking footwear at a steal!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking footwear. I use these for weight training including squats and deadlifts. These a perfect for me. I gambled with getting a size bigger than I normally wear and it paid off.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Hallworth

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately some stitching came away on first use so unsure if these are genuine but only wore for 4 hours or so before they had to go in the bin really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Random matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Im a fan of puma always have and always will be. These are nice and comfy and your feet dint get too hot in them. Fine for running and walking in
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Comfy trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a “starter” pair of running trainers. As I need to get my fat arse off the sofa and Xbox since COVID-19 started. Just started couch to 5k and wore these. Really, really comfortable and fitted just right. Really impressed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hammond french polishing

customer_reviews.title: Good all round trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Good trainers alittle wider fitting than my last puma pair but I wear thick sports socks so that isn't a problem.

customer_reviews.text: These are like slippers, better than my Nike, Adidas, which I have always bought I will be buying these again....

customer_reviews.text: Partner really happy with trainers fit perfect. The insole is like memory foam so really comfy to walk in. Delivered 2 days earlier than estimated date aswell.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, good appearance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with lot of excitement for 37.5£ but Amazon decreased the price to 31£, so I returned them and got my money back. Fits well, quite comfortable, quality is average. There is definitely scope to improve quality of material on the topcap. That synthetic leather on top looks fragile and thin, no sure how long it would last.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty smart, been a long time since i bought Puma trainers, this is due to the fact there quite thin at the front, these are nice and wide and fit nicely.

customer_reviews.text: They are a little bit too stiff for me. Not great for running but good for overall gym workout. I will stick with Lunarglides for running.

customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic trainers. They are extremely comfortable and they look great. I am a massive fan of puma and I highly recommend these.

customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are excellent trainers. Really comfortable. You can't go wrong with Puma. 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Where and who made these?
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for training/cross fit once and just to walk 2 more times. When I put them on this morning during lace up the tongue pulled out in my hand, after examining the stitching there was just 3 stitches holding it in place (the wrong place) made me think about quality control and who made them for £60 ?

customer_reviews.text: These are cheap and nasty trainers, not worth the money. I expected a lot better for £45. Wish I’d sent them back before running in them. They are a very narrow fit too, unless you have feet like bananas then you’ll find them very restrictive.

customer_reviews.text: An excellent running shoe, very comfortable and an excellent fit I have a wide foot so can be hard to find a good runner shoes.

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and once I've worn these out I will be looking at getting the exact same pair to replace. I have fairly average foot shape, and they fit very well indeed.

customer_reviews.text: Feels loose around the ankles but fine around the rest of the foot, which makes me not want to train too much with them. Don’t want to get an injury. Just used for walking around which was not the intention.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Tazon 6 Fm Running Shoes
product_meta.description:
A sleek, streamlined silhouette sets the Tazon 6 apart from the rest. Lace up this sixth edition of the PUMA Running-inspired trainer and be bound to enjoy a comfy and stable ride like none other. 

Fit: The upper features a special midfoot saddle for optimum Fit and Comfort Cushioning: An Eva heel pod offers Cushioning and shock absorption Comfort: A Softfoam sockliner gives a soft, plush feel under the foot Synthetic leather upper with perf detailing Midfoot saddle Cushioned midsole TPU shank for increased stability Rubber outsole
feature_bullets: Tazon 6 FM Running Shoes: The men's running shoes in cool white have a super sporty design thanks to the details in red and the slim, streamlined silhouette.
FITNESS SHOES FOR MEN - The sports shoes feature a midfoot saddle that ensures a perfect fit and comfort. EVA heel counter provides comfortable cushioning
The Puma men's jogging shoe is perfect for training: the training shoe offers a pleasantly soft feel under the foot thanks to the soft foam insole.
Whether you are running, in the gym or in your free time: fitness and running shoes from Puma impress with innovative technology, first-class features and cool style.
Puma fitness shoes are known for their versatility. They are not only ideal as sports shoes, but can also be worn as sporty leisure shoes.
